<style>
.gallery-container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  padding: 20px;
}

.gallery-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 30px;

.gallery-item {

  cursor: pointer;

}

}

.gallery-image {
  width: 100%;
  height: 280px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  transition: transform 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

.gallery-item:hover .gallery-image {
  transform: scale(1.08);
}

.gallery-caption {

  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3));

}

.gallery-item:hover .gallery-caption {

/* Modal Styles */
.modal {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  z-index: 2000;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
  animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; }
  to { opacity: 1; }
}

.modal.active {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.modal-content {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 90%;
  max-height: 90vh;
  animation: slideIn 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

@keyframes slideIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: scale(0.95);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

.modal-image {
  max-width: 100%;
  max-height: 70vh;
  object-fit: contain;
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.modal-info {

<script>
let currentImageIndex = 0;
const allImages = [];

// Initialize all gallery images
function initGallery() {
  const items = document.querySelectorAll('.gallery-item');
  items.forEach((item, index) => {
    const img = item.querySelector('.gallery-image');
    const caption = item.querySelector('.gallery-caption');
    allImages.push({
      src: img.src,
      title: caption.querySelector('h3').textContent,
      description: caption.querySelector('p').textContent
    });
  });
}

function openModal(element) {
  const img = element.querySelector('.gallery-image');
  const caption = element.querySelector('.gallery-caption');
  currentImageIndex = allImages.findIndex(img_obj => img_obj.src === img.src);
  
  document.getElementById('modalImage').src = img.src;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = caption.querySelector('h3').textContent;
  document.getElementById('modalCaption').textContent = caption.querySelector('p').textContent;
  document.getElementById('imageModal').classList.add('active');
}

function closeModal(event) {
  if (event.target.id === 'imageModal' || event.target.classList.contains('close-modal')) {
    document.getElementById('imageModal').classList.remove('active');
  }
}

function nextImage(event) {
  event.stopPropagation();
  currentImageIndex = (currentImageIndex + 1) % allImages.length;
  const image = allImages[currentImageIndex];
  document.getElementById('modalImage').src = image.src;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = image.title;
  document.getElementById('modalCaption').textContent = image.description;
}

function previousImage(event) {
  event.stopPropagation();
  currentImageIndex = (currentImageIndex - 1 + allImages.length) % allImages.length;
  const image = allImages[currentImageIndex];
  document.getElementById('modalImage').src = image.src;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = image.title;
  document.getElementById('modalCaption').textContent = image.description;
}

// Keyboard navigation
document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
  const modal = document.getElementById('imageModal');
  if (modal.classList.contains('active')) {
    if (e.key === 'ArrowRight') nextImage({stopPropagation: () => {}});
    if (e.key === 'ArrowLeft') previousImage({stopPropagation: () => {}});
    if (e.key === 'Escape') closeModal({target: modal});
  }
});

// Initialize gallery on page load
initGallery();
</script>
